titles.title: Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act
To designate certain mountain peaks in the State of Colorado as ``Fowler Peak'' and "Boskoff Peak".
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Natural Resources. H. Rept. 115-291.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 78.

bill.summary:
Fowler and Boskoff Peaks Designation Act
This bill designates specified mountain peaks in the Uncompahgre National Forest in Colorado as "Fowler Peak" and "Boskoff Peak."
